metadata.title: CVE-2013-3558 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
The dissect_ccp_bsdcomp_opt function in epan/dissectors/packet-ppp.c in thePPP CCP dissector in Wireshark 1.8.x before 1.8.7 does not terminate abit-field list, which allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service(application crash) via a malformed packet.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2013-3558` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libwireshark-data - 1.10.6-1
libwireshark3 - 1.10.6-1
libwiretap3 - 1.10.6-1
libwsutil3 - 1.10.6-1
tshark - 1.10.6-1
wireshark - 1.10.6-1
wireshark-common - 1.10.6-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: wireshark package in trusty, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.10.6-1').
